alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 6:20PM EDT until April 03 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Miami-Dade County in southeastern Florida... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 619 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Richmond West, or near Kendall, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coral Gables, South Miami, Black Point, Kendall and The Redland. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
